sentences.cn: 可是这时候,会吏长开始筹划着某种坚决反对的有力措施.

sentences.en: Clever people should meditate on the problems before acting.
sentences.cn: 聪明的人应该是在采取行动前先仔细考虑一下.

sentences.en: I meditate on your precepts and consider your ways.
sentences.cn: 15我要默想你的训词、看重你的道路.

sentences.en: I meditate upon Him, for He is the Absolute Truth.
sentences.cn: 我冥想祂, 因为祂是绝对真理.

sentences.en: I receive information and meditate calmly on those events, " he wrote . "
sentences.cn: 我 获取信息, 冷静地深思这些事件.

sentences.en: I swear that I meditate no harm; I don't desire to cause any disturbance.
sentences.cn: 我发誓我不想害人; 我并不想引起任何乱子.

sentences.en: I try to meditate for half an hour every evening.
sentences.cn: 我每天晚上尽量默想半小时。

sentences.en: I will meditate on all Your work And muse on Your deeds.
sentences.cn: 诗77:12我也要思想你的经营、默念你的作为.

sentences.en: It is important to meditate on the meaning of life.
sentences.cn: 思考人生的意义很重要.

sentences.en: It was only to sit in his own rooms in a neighbouring hotel and meditate.
sentences.cn: 那不过是要坐在附近旅馆他自己的房间里沉思默想罢了.

sentences.en: On the day her son began school, she meditated on the uncertainties of his future.
sentences.cn: 在她儿子入学那天，她深思了有关他未来的种种不确定因素。

sentences.en: Questioner: All teachers advise to meditate. What is the purpose of meditation?
sentences.cn: 问: 所有导师建议冥想. 冥想的目的何在?

sentences.en: She sat quietly, meditating on the day’s events.
sentences.cn: 她静静地坐着，思考着这一天发生的事。

sentences.en: To become more like Christ, meditate on who He is.
sentences.cn: 要更像基督, 就要常思想祂是谁.

sentences.en: To meditate is to labour; to think is to act.
sentences.cn: 沉思就是劳动, 思索就是行动.

sentences.en: When you get quiet and meditate about them, how do you feel?
sentences.cn: 当你静下新来考虑这些时, 你感觉 如何 ?

sentences.en: Within your temple, O God, we meditate on your unfailing love.
sentences.cn: 9上帝啊, 我们在你的殿中想念你的慈爱.
